attributes.action: Parliament to reject the EU referendum result if voters were misled
attributes.additional_details:
The referendum result was won on a false premise if the British people were misled. 

As there is no way back from Great Britain leaving the European Union, we, the undersigned, call upon parliament to vote to reject the result of the EU referendum if the result was potentially influenced by misinformation
attributes.background:
The Leave Campaign’s “Let’s give our NHS the £350 million the EU takes every week” statement was evidently a key factor in the Leave campaign’s referendum victory. 

However, it is increasingly clear that members of the Leave campaign have no intention of honouring the promises they made.

rejection.details:
We're not sure how you would like Parliament to determine whether or not voters were misled. If you would like a public enquiry into the EU referendum campaign, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/145002
